entry.summary:

Type: Generator Covers
Price: 28.99

Features

  • Integrated shock cord for secure fit
  • Fits most 5,000 to 8,000 watt portable generators

entry.title: DuroMax XP10000-DXKIT 100-Foot Extension Power Cord Kit w/ Generator Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: DuroMax
Type: Generator Covers
Price: 129.00

Features
    100-Foot / 50-Foot Extension Power Cord - XPC12100A
  • Heavy Duty DuroMax Power Cord is Outdoor rated for safe use on the job site or in the yard.
  • Bright Yellow Jacket allows for high-visibility to help prevent accidental cutting and damage.
  • Reinforced blades minimize bending of prongs and reduce breakage.
  • Lighted ends allow the user to confirm when power is supplied to the cord.
  • Heavy-duty PVC jacket resists moisture, abrasion, and temperature.
  • Grounded plugs allow for safe operation.
    • 100-Foot / 50-Foot Extension Power Cord - XPC12050C
  • Heavy Duty DuroMax Power Cord is Outdoor rated for safe use on the job site or in the yard.
  • Bright Yellow Jacket allows for high-visibility to help prevent accidental cutting and damage.
  • Reinforced blades minimize bending of prongs and reduce breakage.
  • Lighted ends allow the user to confirm when power is supplied to the cord.
  • Heavy-duty PVC jacket resists moisture, abrasion, and temperature.
  • Grounded plugs allow for safe operation.
    • Large Nylon Generator Cover - XPLGC
  • Custom fits Duromax generators including the following models: XP8500, XP10000E, XP10000EH, XP4000WGE
  • Will fit generators with or without handles and wheel kit.
  • Dimensions: 30" W x 22" D x 22-1/2" H.
  • DuroMax logo printed on front.
